text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day, heavy rain necessitates we<n>cancel our outdoor
training. I'm<n>spending time in my office to put<n>together an
indoor training plan.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I've noticed that I've been losing<n>items much more often
lately.<n>Yesterday I misplaced some<n>paperwork from the
academy, and<n>today it appears I've lost my pen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I stand up from my desk to go fetch a<n>new one, when—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bump!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though I'm alone in my office, I feel<n>as if someone has
collided with me,<n>and I stumble forward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That won't do. How am I supposed<n>to be an effective
trainer if I'm just<n>bumbling around? I slap myself on<n>the
cheek and proceed.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Phew... Um... trainer? The music...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I notice that the music we were using<n>for our shuttle runs
has stopped.
choice_data_list: Oh, sorry! I spaced out for a moment!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Hey... Have you, um...
choice_data_list: I should probably get more rest.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No... That's not it.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Have you noticed... anything strange<n>recently?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: If not... good.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Maybe you should call it a day here?
choice_data_list: Yeah, that's probably for the best.
Yeah, that's probably for the best.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Okay... In that case, I'll be sticking<n>around a little longer.
choice_data_list: Oh, then I'm okay to stay too.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You don't... need to do that. Please go<n>home and rest...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No detours... Go straight home... And<n>also...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You shouldn't come to the training<n>course at night... At least
for a little<n>while...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You mustn't visit me... at night...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I walk outside to find that the rain has<n>stopped. I head home
while pondering<n>what she just told me.
choice_data_list:
(She doesn't want me visiting her at night for a
while it seems...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maybe she's upset with me for all<n>the careless mistakes I
made today. I<n>begin to think of ways to avoid<n>making the
same blunders tomorrow,<n>when...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm chilled to my very core. It's as if<n>someone is glaring at
me from<n>behind...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I turn quickly to find no one there. I<n>still feel some kind of
presence<n>directly behind me!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I forgot... to tell you something.
choice_data_list: Y-you scared me half to death!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry... That wasn't my intention.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I just wanted to tell you to be<n>careful...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: So with that said...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I knew it... Instead of me, it looks like<n>it's targeting Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Is it... displeased? Or could it be...
